title: How to Lux

embed.description: The next video in my series of champion guides. This time I teach you how to play Lux. This in-depth guide will get straight to what you need to know to play Lux well. It doesn't matter what your skill level is, this guide will give you tips and hints that will further improve your Lux skills.

body:
A new tutorial video teaching you how to play League of Legends. This time it's Lux.
As always, I teach in form of musical montage.
